org.net.p2p
Class MsgFile

java.lang.Object
  org.net.p2p.MsgFile

public class MsgFile
extends java.lang.Object

Allows for wrapping of files to be added to message

MsgFile a=new MsgFile(File a)

b.fill(a);

[where b is instance of Msg]
